This page provides auxiliary material for the course [Applied Statistics and Data Analysis](https://www.paulamoraga.com/course-aramco/) (ASDA), given by [Dr. Paula Moraga](https://www.paulamoraga.com/). In this page, you can find a few different case studies (and an introduction to [`tidyverse`](https://www.tidyverse.org/)) that can be accessed in the above tabs.
